doc:
Bradley Barker https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bradley_Barker 0 Kathleen Joann Bradley (born January 10, 1951) is an American former model, actress and host. Bradley is primarily known as a "Barker's Beauty" on the CBS daytime game show The Price Is Right from 1990 until 2000. Bradley is noted as the first permanent African-American model on the show. Kathleen_Joann_Bradley ( born January_10_,_1951 ) is an_American_former_model_,_actress_and_host . Bradley is_primarily_known as a_"_Barker 's_Beauty " on the_CBS_daytime_game_show The_Price Is Right from 1990 until 2000 . Bradley is_noted as the_first_permanent_African-American_model on the_show .
